Text: this is taking forever. im at 59%
heads up to anyone that doesnt know anything about this game... its weird as sh*t, chicks get (semi)naked, the girls in this game are crazy as hell. Game is very weird
the whole ar tonelico series is like that, nothing new. I just wish they'd get completely naked and had hairy ones.

I'm about 20 hours in this one. For those that are into japanese anime porn you'll like this game as it comes pretty close. Alot more sexual innuendoes than previous ar tonelico's. Hilarious as hell when your roomie walks in to a screen that says "oh soma, its' so hot inside you" out of context. one of many of those "lol wtf" moments. I just wish this was rated 18+.
